mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM sys_menu m RIGHT JOIN sys_role_menu mr ON m.menu_id = mr. menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = mr.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE ur.user_id= #{userid}
SELECT m.id,m.role_id AS roleId, m.menu_id AS menuId FROM sys_role_menu m where m.role_id = #{role}
